|desc_3      = When his [[HP]] is lower than '''70%''', he may enter an enhanced state, gaining enhanced attacks and high [[Interruption Resistance]]. This state lasts for 20 seconds. |name_4      = Returning Frostwheel
|desc_4      = Connects his dual blades and throws it out as a vertical wheel that travels a short distance and returns to him, dealing '''25% ATK × 2''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}} on hit. This attack is only used while enhanced.

|name_5      = Boomerang
|desc_5      = Connects his dual blades and throws it out as a horizontal disc that travels in a circle and and returns to him, dealing '''35% ATK''' as {{Color|Cryo DMG}} on hit. This attack is only used while enhanced.

|name_6      = Taunt
|desc_6      = If the player is far away, he will taunt the player, leaving him open to attacks.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps from the golden desert sands. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.<br />A professional mercenary who cares about nothing outside of work and the mission at hand. To such people, their only game plan is to complete the mission, and their high asking prices on the market match that committment.<br />An ominous, fragmented spirit is sealed within the weapon they use, awakening in moments of peril. Once it does, it can only be silenced by the cries of the vanquished — whether that be its wielder, or its wielder's foe.|[[Archive]]}}
